Title: Tulipunainen kyyhkynen
Actors: Tauno Palo, Gunvor Sandkvist, Helen Elde, Matti Oravisto
Plot: Doctor Aitamaa is spending holiday with his family at their summer villa. He accidentally reads a letter that was meant to his wife. The letter is from another man. Aitamaa fallows his wife to the city and finds out that she has a lover. Later the wife is found killed and Aitamaa becomes the prime suspect.
